title: Partnering with Black Forest Labs to bring FLUX.2 [dev] to Workers AI
summary:
**AI-Generated Summary**: This is an automated summary of a Cloudflare blog post created using AI. For the full details and context, please read the original post.

**Cloudflare Partners with Black Forest Labs to Bring FLUX.2 [dev] to Workers AI**

Cloudflare has partnered with Black Forest Labs to bring their latest image generation model, FLUX.2 [dev], to the Workers AI platform. FLUX.2 is an open-weight contender that offers photorealistic outputs and high-fidelity generations, building upon the success of its predecessor, FLUX.1 [schnell]. The model is now available to run on Cloudflare's inference platform, Workers AI, and can be accessed through the platform's developer documentation.

**Key Features and Technical Details**

FLUX.2 boasts several key features, including:

* Physical world grounding, allowing for the generation of realistic images with accurate lighting, shadows, reflections, and depth perception.
* Digital world assets, enabling the creation of high-quality digital assets such as landing pages and infographics.
* Multi-language support, allowing for the generation of images and text in multiple languages.
* Multi-reference editing with state-of-the-art character consistency, solving for stochastic drift and ensuring identities, products, and styles remain consistent.

**Practical Implications for Developers**

The integration of FLUX.2 on Workers AI provides developers with a powerful tool for generating high-quality images and digital assets. With its ability to understand context, tone, and trends, FLUX.2 can be used for a wide range of applications, including creative photography, e-commerce product shots, marketing visuals, and interior design. Developers can access the model through the platform's developer documentation and use it to create engaging and editorial-quality digital assets from short prompts.
